law.catch_line: Policies to be readable -- Factors to be considered.

text.section: All insurance policies subject to the provisions of KRS 304.14-420 to 304.14-450 shall be written in language easily readable and understandable by a person of average intelligence and education.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1158, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 225, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1988.
